sentence: The spa is beyond anything you can imagine with impeccable service
And the spa staff seemed to be cut from the same cloth
That is we have received better service at the Drury Inn in Columbia Missouri than Dorado Beach and Ritz Carlton should be ashamed
The east side is very pretty but no real beach access or lounge chairs or service
Waiting for bell service – expect 20 30 minutes past the stated time
Service at times was a little slow but the personalities of the staff was excellent
However in this instance there was a pattern of service issues as we encountered a problem with service every day
I saw little children having fun in the care of young hotel staff for daycare
It was closed during our entire stay and it frequently took over 45 minutes for room service to deliver it to our room
One of our host Michael went so far as to even personally bring evening dinner to our room from the resort restaurant whose menu was NOT on the room service menu
The front desk gave me our new guys cell phone who I called and left a VM he called back promptly and had the batteries replaced in the remote the TV worked fine from that point on
She even escorted our son home one evening after his Ambassadors Activity
Spent a wondeful time at the resort it is expensive but the level of quality customer service and attention to detail is second to none
Not only is this a vacation it is paradise and the staff is fabulous
Transportation only option the hotel really presents to you are limo services which run about 175 for a 30 minute drive to a restaurant same to and from the airport
outlets lightsTwo separate pools with plenty of seating options Beautiful stretch of private beachCons Really terrible service
We ordered room service several times and it was delicious
During our introductory tour of the property as we were escorted to our room our ambassador stated that no shorts of any type were allowed at Mi Casa
The Personal Service Made a Difference
Perhaps the best part of the hotel is the staff and service
The butler ambassador service that comes with the room package is something that you do not expect you will use but end up using routinely and loving

nothing short of amazing life long memorieshigh level service beyond expectationsexcelent food and restaurants v pricey fabulous property rare combination of immaculate surroundings and sophisticated architectureimpecable serviceeasy to reachchild friendly exceptional beachnature sanctuarynot interested to leave the property for one second nothing
Multimedical rehabilitation center offering their services
We felt we begged the staff for everything
Chafeur service very good but more expensive by far than a taxi so if you have to cut corners that s a good olace to do it
Your team truly seems like they love working there and being the best that they can be
The service was mostly very good but it is not the only place with mostly very good service
We were delighted with little surprises like a fresh fruit in the room and a complimentary dessert when they felt our service was too slow we did not
From the location to the service to the food my breath is simply taken away with their perfection
The service at this property is second to none
They embody not only service but also excellent accommodations and amenities
Lastly we asked your team to set up a private catamaran for a day
The individual service is great but there is something lacking about how it all works together right now
And while the staff are all very pleasant the service levels are inconsistent at best and fall well short of resorts at this price point
The service was generally friendly however unlike other Ritzs or Four Seasons the staff were not jumping out of their shoes to serve
We have had butler service everywhere else and it was unparalleled
On the downside the service is spotty

Problems from our first day of our vacation included taking 6 hours after check in to deliver a crib to our room which we requested in our reservation again when we checked in and told them it is urgent so our baby can nap and 6 calls to the front desk after which they told us each time that it was on its way not true unles it takes them several hours to bring it to our dor room service did not deliver what we asked for and took so long to get the correct order that we just gave up and ate the food they gave us air conditioner in room did n’t work and after several calls to engineering they still could n’t fix it and we could barely sleep because it was so hot refused to put us in another room that may not have the problems we were having with the AC even though they were vacant because they were higher tier rooms
I wana give my shout out to Abdiel Colon whose service at the pool was extraordinary
We ca n’t say enough great things about the staff
The concierge will attend to every need or wish
I also want to mention that The Loss Prevention Team Antonio Quinones and Felix Echavaria was amazing
We actually had one of the beach attendants behave in a hostile and threatening manner as he delivered drinks to us more then an hour after ordering
The staff just seems overwhelmed and frantic
Between the restaurants and room service we did not experience a bad meal
We arrived and we are told that there were no service available
